author: Sarah Deen For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Poldark and Demelza look happier than ever as season 3 filming continues | Metro News
text:
Sarah Deen for Metro.co.uk Saturday 11 Feb 2017 4:45 pm Poldark and Demelza walk arm in arm as scenes were shot for season 3 (Picture: FameFlynet UK) 
Filming on Poldark season 3 is underway, and these new pictures from the set show the hero and his wife Demelza looking loved up. 
The couple were in a bit of a rocky patch when series 2 ended. Ross Poldark had done the dirty on Demelza with Elizabeth, and Demelza came close to betraying her man with Captain McNeil. 
Demelza nearly took their son and was prepared to leave Ross for good, but he managed to coax his lady back into his arms . 
And from the looks of these photos the couple are on much better terms when the next season begins. 
The action drew a crowd on location in Wells, Somerset as actors Aidan Turner and Eleanor Tomlinson strolled through the streets arm in arm. Aidan Turner and Eleanor Tomlinson get to work (Picture: FameFlynet UK) 
Crowds of extras were also present at the shoot, suggested it would be some sort of town or marketplace scene. To view this video please enable JavaScript, and consider upgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
Eleanor wore a dark orange dress at one point while Aidan sported Poldark’s trademark hat, and long dramatic coat. The actors were filming on location in Somerset (Picture: FameFlynet UK) 
Tomlinson was also seen in a green dress with a grey shawl and a smart hat, suggesting that they’re off somewhere a bit special. 
Meanwhile Aidan chilled out between takes with a cigarette and at one point clutched a hot water bottle. We reckon Ross would disapprove, preferring to tough it out like Chilly Aidan clutched a hot water bottle (Picture: FameFlynet UK) 
Poldark will return later this year.
